name: The Finals: Season 3
summary:
Season 3 was the third season of THE FINALS. It launched on June 13, 2024, and ended on September 26, 2024. It was revealed on June 7, 2024, at Summer Game Fest. The season followed a predominately Japanese theme.

This season was sponsored by ENGIMO, introducing the all-new arena Kyoto and the tournament series World Tour, alongside OSPUZE, which sponsored the OSPUZE Expo, and DISSUN.

New content introduced in Season 3 includes:
- Arena: Kyoto
- Game Modes: World Tour, ranked Terminal Attack
- New cosmetics
- New Battle Pass
- Weapons: Recurve Bow, Dual Blades, Spear
- Gadget: Thermal Bore
- Specialization: Winch Claw
- Progression: New career levels
- Team text chat on PC
